en-US.youPerishedInBattle: You perished in battle. Perhaps you fought fiercely or perhaps you were outmatched. Pick your battles carefully.
en-US.alasTheDaylightHasOverwhelmedYou: Alas, the daylight has overwhelmed you. You should have tried harder to find shelter.
en-US.youHavePlayedFor: You managed to stay safe from the daylight for a grand total of {days} days and {hours} hours.
